name: Seagle Air - FTO
about: Seagle Air - FTO, located at Trenčín Airport in Slovakia, is a renowned flight training organization certified as FTO SK/02. We offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs, from the Private Pilot License (PPL) to the Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL), including commercial pilot licenses, instrument ratings, and multi-engine endorsements. Our training adheres to the strict standards of JAR-FCL 1, supervised by experienced instructors from major global airlines. Our fleet consists of modern, safety-compliant aircraft such as the Diamond DA20, DA40, and DA42 Twin Star. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Seagle Air - FTO is dedicated to transforming aspiring aviators into professional pilots. Join us for a top-notch aviation education tailored to your goals.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
